description: An official SIML (Synthetic Intelligence Markup Language) interpreter for .Net Framework. This is a Portable Class Library and can target multiple platforms. Using this library developers can easily create intelligent Chatbots or integrate Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing to their .Net and Mono applications.
releaseNotes:
1. User and Bot elements can be used within patterns and are now dynamic in nature.
2. Settings now has a VariableUpdated event
3. Removed the need to use Load(); function prior to ChatRequest
4. AdapterParameter is now Context
5. Variables can now consume XML Text if no Value element is specified
6. Functional and Custom Variables are now possible with the usage of IVariable interface
7. Response now have Ranks assigned to them.
8. Settings can now apply values to properties of arbitrary objects.
9. Target and ID added to Settings
10. Variable extensions added
11. Added support for Components
12. Converted reserved variables of Bot and User to IFunctionalVariable type
13. Added support for Map reversal
14. Added Interface to Collection items to allow customization and extension.
15. Added experimental <Esc> element
16. Added event handlers for Bot learning and memorizing
17. Memorized SIML can now be loaded into specified User's Graph
18. Support for weighted random added
19. Variable overlap check added.
20. Prefer Bot and User name over IDs while writing logs.
title: Syn Bot
